A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was a forced departure from the past. They made it about Rey for the sake of it. Her character has less depth than young AnatSkywalker. I loved episode VII. I loved Rogue one.


This movie has the most plot holes and anticlimactic endings to themes of the 8 core films. This was made to purely to be spectacle and paid little service to the rich worlds created before it.
F*ck you Kathleen Kennedy and F*ck you Rian Johnson.  I'll take Jar Jar over this steaming pile. Shock and Awe doth not replace substance.
